popularityCurve.label: ga general aviation pilot deviations continue to be the primary source of runway incursions and what is disturbing for me as a pilot is the number of controller instruction-read back issues the pilot is told to hold short of a runway the pilot reads back the instruction correctly but proceeds to enter the runway anyway it's something that is just extremely frustrating
